name: Zero Towel Dilemma: Giskers Escape
description:
Your cat, Gisker, is being a real jerk. He's peed on the carpet, locked all the doors, and hidden the paper towels from you! Unlock the doors and find the paper towels before all hope is lost, and Gisker's pee stains the carpet!

Team Members:

  • EntranceJew Programming, Additional Design and Sound Work
  • Amerogin All the beautiful art and especially the ducks.
  • jab50yen Gisker's TV screen.

Music used with permission by ovjoy.

Note for judges: An hour before submitting I was attempting to prep the itch upload phase so nothing went wrong during the actual submission -- because I was expecting to have to fill out a form to provide the personal data mentioned in the rules. I couldn't figure out how to begin submitting the game, but it turns out it already had been submitted. In the process of removing some debug stuff and doing a final build the itch clock felt like it jumped ahead 7 minutes instantly and my actual build went up post-deadline, so it should probably be disqualified.

Note for everyone else: I had fun working on the game, it's the first time I've gotten to actually involve my girlfriend in some of the game design, I definitely picked a bad time to have her produce a boatload of assets when she wasn't familiar with the pipeline for getting them all in-game. (This is the shortest game jam I've ever participated in.) Even though the game doesn't have everything I was looking to have in it by today there's a pretty good chance I'll finish it up some time. I haven't slept since Friday when I got the email saying the jam had already started so I'm going to bed now.
